main event: A UFO was detected on ground radar for 5 minutes in Mineola, Long Island, New York on June 7, 1957.
interesting points: The duration of the radar observation was 5 minutes.
The number of objects detected was not given.
The direction, elevation, and distance of the objects from the observer were not provided.
The movements of the objects were not described.
The conclusion was that the object was 'not known', and possibly a balloon or aircraft.
sighted object: unidentified object detected on ground radar
